title: Which country is the least educated? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is simply out of the internet: 1. South Sudan Literacy rate: 27% ; Male: 40%; Female: 16% 2. Mali Literacy rate: 27.7% Male: 36.1% Female: 19.8% 3. Afghanistan Literacy rate: 28.1% Male:43.1% Female: 12.6% 4. Burkina Faso Literacy rate: 28.7% Male: 36.7% Female: 21.6% 5. Niger Literacy rate: 28.7% Male: 42.9% Female: 15.1% 6. Sierra Leone Literacy rate: 35.1% Male: 46.9% Female: 24.4% 7. Chad Literacy rate: 35.4% Male:45.6% Female: 25.4 8. Ethiopia Literacy rate: 39% Male:49.1% Female: 28.9% 9. Senegal Literacy rate: 39.3% Male:51.1% Female:29.2% 10. Guinea Literacy rate: 41% Male: 52% Female: 30% 11. Benin Literacy rate: 42.4% Male: 55.2% Female: 30.3% source:11 Least Educated Countries in the World
